extension.summary: Find and resolve media from a url to play or open.
extension.description:
PlayThis will attempt to find and resolve* media from a url to play or open. A history list is available for future use, exporting to .m3u/.strm** and sending to a remote PlayThis add-on. Supports video, audio, images and executable***. * resolves using youtube-dl ** exported .m3u/.strm is only usable in Kodi w/ PlayThis installed *** 'executable' items are urls with potential results available through scraping
Companion browser extension available on the Chrome Web Store and Mozilla's AMO Gallery
Artwork by @konsumer420
